thread.title: Pictureframes.com Named the Exclusive Online Custom Framing Source for The Jane Seymour Moulding Collection
thread.title_full: Pictureframes.com Named the Exclusive Online Custom Framing Source for The Jane Seymour Moulding Collection

title: Pictureframes.com Named the Exclusive Online Custom Framing Source for The Jane Seymour Moulding Collection
text:
Pictureframes.com Named the Exclusive Online Custom Framing Source for The Jane Seymour Moulding Collection ET | Source: Graphik Dimensions Ltd. 
High Point, NC, Oct. 05, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pictureframes.com Named the Exclusive Online Custom Framing Source for The Jane Seymour Moulding Collection 
High Point, NC (October 5, 2015) – Pictureframes.com, the online entity of Graphik Dimensions Ltd. (GD), is thrilled to announce they are now the exclusive online custom framing source for Artist and Designer Jane Seymour’s Moulding Collection. 
Through partnership with fine moulding and design company, FOTIOU, GD fell in love with the unique beauty of the line designed by Artist & Actress, Jane Seymour. The Jane Seymour line offers a wide array of mouldings to enhance the work of Photographers, Artists, Home Redecorators, Interior Designers and beyond. 
“We admire Jane for who she is as a person – a Designer, Artist, Philanthropist, Actress - and all that she’s done in the world. As a values-driven organization, we encourage people to buy less and love it more, by opting for quality – and her moulding designs give our customers a level of uniqueness that they crave when creating their next masterpiece.” Says Geo Krieg, President of Graphik Dimensions Ltd./pictureframes.com. “Not every town has an accessible frame shop, so we are excited to make these stunning frames available to our global family.” 
As the exclusive online custom framing source for the Jane Seymour Moulding Collection, GD provides a time tested reputation within the custom framing industry. Celebrating its 50 th year, the company’s expertise and passion for sharing in their customers’ creativity and inspiration goes unmatched. Expanding its already impressive selection with this offering allows their audience to bring a Designer’s eye into their spaces and elevate their creations. 
“Pictureframes.com is the perfect online community to showcase the fashion forward picture frame moulding styles of Jane Seymour and we couldn’t be happier to work with them on this exciting campaign” states Barry Diamond, Chief Marketing Officer of FOTIOU. “Their state of the art technology and dedication to exceptional customer service are a powerful testament to why pictureframes.com was selected as Fotiou’s exclusive online custom framing source for the Jane Seymour Moulding Collection.” 
All of the offerings at pictureframes.com have been selected as the best-in-class throughout each category – from sourcing material consciously, to creating economical value for the products, to listening to customers’ wants and needs. Each of the curated Jane Seymour Moulding Collections are no different, and the company looks forward to a flourishing relationship with FOTIOU in bringing these elegant frames to its Creative Community. #### 
Graphik Dimensions Ltd./pictureframes.com 
Artist and family founded, Graphik Dimensions Ltd.®/pictureframes.com is the premier source for fine art quality custom printing, framing and wall décor needs. They serve Artists, Photographers, Galleries, Grandmas and Fortune 500 companies the world over, with the innovative technology solutions that make it effortless and fun to create and decorate. Graphik Dimensions Ltd. is fueled by C4 (Consciousness, Community, Creativity, Collaboration) values to empower customers, employees, vendors and business partners at every level. They are widely recognized for their exceptional value and quality, customer care and evolutionary corporate culture. For more information, visit www.pictureframes.com , or call 1.800.332.8884 
Contact: Robyn Feinsod Phone: 336-887-3700 Email: media@graphikdimensions.com Related Articles
